attendees.title: Complex Auto Claims Specialist
attendees.description: At State Farm®, our mission is to help people manage the risks of everyday life, recover from the unexpected, and realize their dreams. We are passionate and driven to create possibilities, and we’re serious about being here to help life go right™ for customers by providing solutions for all of life’s moments.

headlines.headline: Taking Stock of Your Belongings for the Future
headlines.blurb: Making a record of your possessions can prove useful for insurance purposes or planning a move, and you can find plenty of apps to help with the job.

headlines.headline: Why Driving Fewer Miles May Not Lead to Lower Auto Premiums
headlines.blurb: People who don't drive much usually get in fewer accidents. But, a study finds, insurers typically emphasize a driver's marital status or credit score.

headlines.headline: Kazakhstan Prizes Its Cowboys, but Few Want to Saddle Up for Harsh Life
headlines.blurb: Kazakh cowboys, while proud of providing their rapidly modernizing nation with a link to its nomadic past, rarely want their children to follow them onto the frigid steppes.

attendees.title: Vice President, Technology Resources
attendees.description: Learn how to bring your guests and marketing efforts into balance. Use what digital tools you need, rather than what someone is selling. Create strategies that allow you down to a property level look good and feel connected to exactly the guests that want your location when they want it.

headlines.headline: News | Hospitality Digital Marketing
headlines.blurb: I was a judge for the 2016 Social Media Awards in HOTELS Magazine's October Edition . For the complete article click HERE

headlines.headline: Digital marketing drives hospitality industry, but personal connections are still vital
headlines.blurb: In the second installment of the “Back to the Future” series, Marty, the unsuspecting time traveler, is propelled to the (then) futuristic year of 2015, where he encounters such advanced technology as holographic billboards and advertisements. Now, a couple of years later, holograms aren’t a steady component of digital marketing. However, we may not be too far off the mark.

headlines.headline: Hotel Digital Marketing Benchmarks
headlines.blurb: Access the power of benchmarking in your quest to understand the performance of your digital marketing, and your position within the industry. HSMAI’s Digital Marketing Benchmarks, a project of HSMAI’s Digital Marketing Council, will help you gauge your competitive position on a wide variety of topics that are top of mind for all hoteliers in today’s fast moving environment.

attendees.title: Computer Programming Instructor
attendees.description: Coding with Kids teaches computer programming to elementary and middle school children. We offer after-school enrichment classes, classes in education centers, camps, and Kid's Code-a-thons. We offer multi-year curriculum that will take students from the beginnings of computer science to the master-ship of software development.

headlines.headline: Coding with Kids
headlines.blurb: Looking for a new activity for the family? You may be impressed with your family's abilities if you start coding with the kids!

headlines.headline: New After School Program: Coding With Kids!!
headlines.blurb: Jump start your child’s STEAM education with Coding with Kids’ Little Coders class! Students will develop their computational thinking skills and build their own creative programs.

headlines.headline: Coding With Kids: Six Secrets to Teaching Children to Program
headlines.blurb: Programming education has become a lot more mainstream in the past few decades, but much of the materials are still targeted at middle school and high school audiences. What if you've got younger children and you don't want to wait to teach them how to make software? Well, I say you don't have to!
